price: 7. En nooit kwam er een profeet tot hen of zij bespotten hun eigen profeten.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min nabiyyin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
